docs.lead_paragraph: The Communist International, or Comintern, was founded in March, 1919, with headquarters in Moscow. It is a federation of the Communist parties of the world. Originally it was dedicated to the repudiation of capitalism and bourgeois democracy and to the seizure of power by the world proletariat.
docs.abstract: Lr on s urging passage of Rayburn bill
